objects.text:
Refreshing unisex fragrance for all genders
Generous 100ml/3.4 fl. oz size
Modern and clean fragrance profile
Premium quality, elegant design

product_details.name: BELLAVITA Fresh Unisex EDT - Vibrant & Energizing Fragrance for All
product_details.description:
• Refreshing unisex eau de toilette suitable for all genders
• Generous 100ml/3.4 fl. oz size for long-lasting use
• Sleek turquoise bottle design with premium gold cap
• Perfect for daily wear and casual occasions
• Modern and clean fragrance profile
• Professional-grade eau de toilette formulation
• Elegant packaging ideal for gifting
• Travel-friendly bottle design
• Premium BELLAVITA brand quality
• Fresh and contemporary scent suitable for any season

banner_details:
The banner features a clean and elegant layout designed to promote a unisex fragrance product. At the top, a large, bold brand name ("heading") is centered in a modern sans-serif typeface. Below it, a vibrant and attention-grabbing product title ("subheading") is placed, using a bold font against a soft pastel backdrop. Midway down, descriptive product information ("description") is aligned to the left, providing key highlights in a readable font. A clearly defined price ("price") sits near the bottom left, styled prominently for visibility. A call-to-action button ("cta" over "cta_background") in a contrasting color invites interaction. A professionally shot product image ("product_image") anchors the design on the right. The banner is framed with minimalistic decorative elements and lines ("background_decorative" and "decorative_divider"), lending a premium and structured feel.

**Color Palette:**
- Teal: #0FBFB9
- Deep Teal: #0A8F8C
- Dark Cyan: #2B5F5E
- White: #FFFFFF
- Gold Accent: #DAA520
- Off-white Background: #F5F9FA
product_color: The product features a refreshing, aquatic turquoise base color (#00B7C2), evoking a clean and invigorating feel perfect for a unisex perfume. The sleek, metallic gold cap (#D4AF37) adds an element of luxury and contrast, while white text (#FFFFFF) is used effectively to provide clarity and highlight branding. The color blending is minimalist—sharp divisions between turquoise and gold make the product visually distinctive yet cohesive. These colors can be used to create an advertisement banner that emphasizes freshness (turquoise), elegance (gold), and purity (white). Together, they create a vibrant yet premium palette that appeals to modern, style-conscious consumers.
